I am having trouble in two main areas: fitness evaluation and Q-
learning e=
pisodes in the NEAT+Q algorithm.

After two generations the "max_fitness" d=
rops to zero in the main m-
file, I'm not sure if this is due to fitness sh=
aring or not.  I also 
am not really sure what the requirements really are =
for a fitness 
function, I couldn't locate any guidelines in the literature=
 so I 
have just been using the sum of rewards over one 20 second trial.

I=
 was also wondering where in the training does the value function 
converge=
 over hundreds if not thousands of episodes? I didn't see an 
episode loop =
in Shimon Whiteson's NEAT+Q algorithm so I am unclear 
on how the value-fun=
ction Q would approach the optimum value-
function over a single run fitnes=
s evaluation.

I have just e-mailed Shimon to the same effect, but as I am =
under a 
time restraint I figured I would ask the group as well.

My code t=
hus far can be found at:

http://filebox.vt.edu/users/mirenner/NEATplusQ/

=
the only files I have modified are:
neat_main_modified7.m used to run the p=
rogram
mike_experiment7.m contains pendulum experiment

the linked folder a=
lso contains an added m-file I made to visualize 
the best network in each =
generation, which I will upload to the 
files section once my thesis is com=
plete.

your feedback is appreciated
